text:
Hi All,
Can anyone help tell me how to access the HTML of Landing Page template?

I'm using a free theme called Starter kit from Inbound pixels. I want to change the order of image and description in the mobile screen. I added the code in the theme editor and defined the classes. But not getting the desired output because, when i apply a styling to the container, (for eg: display: flex;) the child element i see in the visual editor are not its direct child element. There is row-fluid from and many other classes and div that is not visible in the visual editor can be seen when i inspect the page. To solve this issue i think i need to access the HTML and add classes and style them accordingly.
How can I solve this.

Thanks in advance
I tried that but it does not count in templates from within the theme for some reason.

solved it myselfâ€¦ thanks.

There seemed to be a conflict when watching using --remove
Now it looks like my response is on the wrong post, sorry. \
